mapper.select: select tac.auth_code, max(tac.create_date) as create_date from tb_auth_code tac, tbl_user pmu, tb_scan_trade sct where tac.mobile_number = pmu.user_account and sct.user_id = pmu.user_id and sct.trade_id = #{tradeId} group by tac.mobile_number
mapper.insert: insert into tb_auth_code ( auth_code, mobile_number, create_user, last_update_user ) values ( #{authCode}, #{mobileNumber}, 'system', 'system' )
